Apparel Visualization

Project type: Apparel Visualization
Year: 2024
Software: Marvelous Designer, Houdini, Nuke
Skills: Modeling / Texturing / Lighting / Comp

Client requested high quality videos of rotating apparel.

Apparel was created in Marvelous Designer. In Houdini these steps were taken: - Model cleanup - Shading with procedural texture to add cloth details - Studio lighting scene - Render - Compositing - FFmpeg conversion to final files
